script-plus.executeCurrentScript: Script Plus: Execute Current Script (Using default configs)
script-plus.cleanUp: Script Plus: Clean up side effects
script-plus.cleanUpAllSideEffects: Script Plus: Clean up all side effects
script-plus.node.packageManager: Specifies the package manager to install packages.
script-plus.packages.installPosition:
Position to install packages.
When set to `local`, packages will be installed in extension global storage.
When set to `global`, packages will be installed in the pacakge manager's global folder.
script-plus.packages.includePrerelease:
Whether to include pre-release version of packages in module search.
When set to true, the version list of large packages may be very long.
script-plus.startUp.autoCheck: Whether to check folder on activate.
script-plus.startUp.warnLocale: Whether to show locale warning on start up.
